required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL to retrieve metadata for.

api_list.api_description: Generates a chart image from a given Chart.js configuration.

required_parameters.name: chart_config
required_parameters.description: The Chart.js configuration object in Javascript or JSON format.

query: I have a list of website URLs that need metadata analysis. Simultaneously, I want to generate a trend chart using specific Chart.js configurations. Can you provide the metadata for 'https://example.com' and also visualize a line chart with my dataset using the QuickChart API?

api_list.api_description: Take a screenshot of the target website.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the website to screenshot.

api_list.api_description: Generates a chart image from a given Chart.js configuration.

required_parameters.name: chart_config
required_parameters.description: The Chart.js configuration object in Javascript or JSON format.

query: Can you take a screenshot of 'https://news.ycombinator.com'? Additionally, create a bar chart from my data configuration using the QuickChart API.
